thread.section_title: Science News and Analysis - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: The 10-Point.

author: Gerard Baker
title: The 10-Point.
text:
Good morning,
FBI Intrigue
Text messages reviewed by the Journal showed that top Federal Bureau of Investigation officials were aware for at least a month before alerting Congress that emails potentially related to an investigation of Hillary Clinton had emerged during a key stretch of the 2016 presidential campaign. That lag is now one focus of an investigation by the Justice Departmentâ€™s inspector general into a variety of FBI actions in advance of the 2016 election. Meanwhile, ratcheting up political tensions in Washington,...
